phrs.translation: 滑稽, 打诨, 滑稽可笑的举动

sentences.sentence: He went to the university of buffoonery.
The buffoonery and derision of Language also have very strong comedy result.
sentences.translation: 语言上的插科打诨、揶揄嘲笑也有很强的喜剧效果。

sentences.sentence: It can take innumerable forms, from buffoonery to the pursuit of posthumous fame.
sentences.translation: 它可以有无数表现形式，从插科打挥到追求死后的名声。
